TASK: Craft an item of type: smithing_table
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 16}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 36, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 18, "index": 28}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "poisonous_potato", "quantity": 64, "index": 36}, {"type": "chicken", "quantity": 9, "index": 37}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 8, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a smithing_table, I need to first craft 2 iron_ingot, and then craft the smithing_table using 4 oak_planks and 2 iron_ingot. To craft the iron_ingot, I need to smelt the iron_nugget at slot 28. To craft the oak_planks, I need to place the oak_log at slot 20 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
